mapper.insert:
insert into flower_shop.t_flower_classify(f_id, fc_color, fc_implication, fc_variety) values
(#{entity.fId}, #{entity.fcColor}, #{entity.fcImplication}, #{entity.fcVariety})

insert into flower_shop.t_flower_classify(f_id, fc_color, fc_implication, fc_variety) values
(#{entity.fId}, #{entity.fcColor}, #{entity.fcImplication}, #{entity.fcVariety})
on duplicate key update f_id = values(f_id) , fc_color = values(fc_color) , fc_implication = values(fc_implication) , fc_variety = values(fc_variety)
